comments.body: I tested this with 3.0.24 and I can't reproduce this. If this is still reproducable? Can you show me error happening on the physical computer? Is this the same computer that is causing TIMOB-12744? Maybe they're related?
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
